visState: {"title":"Netflow: Cities (flow records)","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index=\"netflow-*\", split=\"geoip.city_name:10\", kibana=true).scale_interval(1s).fit(mode=scale).if(operator=\"lt\", if=0, then=0).trim(start=2,end=1).label(regex=\"^.* geoip.city_name:(.+) > .*$\", label=\"$1\").lines(width=1, stack=true, fill=1).yaxis(label=\"flow records / sec\", min=0)","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
